languages.text: {n}Один из блюстителей гнусавит:{/n} "Схвачен при попытке прорваться к арестованной черни. Устроил потасовку, еле скрутили. Потребовал аудиенции с вами, Леди Иокаста". {n}Мастер дисциплины кивает, и блюстители отпускают пленника.{/n}

{n}One of the enforcers drones nasally,{/n} "We apprehended him while he was trying to break through to the detained rabble. Got into a scuffle. We barely managed to restrain the troublemaker. He demanded an audience with you, Mistress Sauerback." {n}The Master-at-Arms nods, and the enforcers release their prisoner.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Один из блюстителей гнусавит:{/n} "Схвачен при попытке прорваться к арестованной черни. Устроил потасовку, еле скрутили. Потребовал аудиенции с вами, Леди Иокаста". {n}Мастер дисциплины кивает, и блюстители отпускают пленника.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}One of the enforcers drones nasally:{/n} "Captured while trying to break through to the detained rabble. Got into a scuffle, we barely managed to restrain him. Demanded an audience with you, Lady Jocasta." {n}The Master-at-Arms nods, and the enforcers release their prisoner.{/n}

He demanded an audience with you, Mistress Sauerback." {n}The Master-at-Arms nods, and the enforcers release their prisoner.{/n}

He demanded an audience with you, Mistress Sauerback." {n}The Master-at-Arms nods, and the enforcers release their prisoner.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Einer der Enforcer verkündet mit nasaler Stimme: {/n} "Wir haben ihn festgenommen, als er zu den Häftlingen durchbrechen wollte. Es gab ein Handgemenge. Wir konnten den Störenfried nur mit Mühe überwältigen. Er hat nach einer Audienz mit Euch verlangt, Meisterin Sauerback." {n}Auf ein Nicken der Waffenmeisterin lassen die Enforcer ihren Gefangenen frei.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}One of the enforcers drones nasally,{/n} "We apprehended him while he was trying to break through to the detained rabble. Got into a scuffle. We barely managed to restrain the troublemaker. He demanded an audience with you, Mistress Sauerback." {n}The Master-at-Arms nods, and the enforcers release their prisoner.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Einer der Enforcer verkündet mit nasaler Stimme: {/n} "Wir haben ihn festgenommen, als er zu den Häftlingen durchbrechen wollte. Es gab ein Handgemenge. Wir konnten den Störenfried nur mit Mühe überwältigen. Er hat nach einer Audienz mit Euch verlangt, Meisterin Sauerback." {n}Auf ein Nicken der Waffenmeisterin lassen die Enforcer ihren Gefangenen frei.{/n}

languages.text: {n}D'une voix nasillarde, l'un des prévôts explique :{/n} « Nous l'avons appréhendé alors qu'il cherchait à rejoindre les détenus. Il y a eu une bagarre, et nous avons eu le plus grand mal à le maîtriser. Il a demandé une audience avec vous, maîtresse Sauerback. » {n}Sur un signe de tête de la capitaine d'armes, les prévôts relâchent leur prisonnier.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}One of the enforcers drones nasally,{/n} "We apprehended him while he was trying to break through to the detained rabble. Got into a scuffle. We barely managed to restrain the troublemaker. He demanded an audience with you, Mistress Sauerback." {n}The Master-at-Arms nods, and the enforcers release their prisoner.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}D'une voix nasillarde, l'un des prévôts explique :{/n} « Nous l'avons appréhendé alors qu'il cherchait à rejoindre les détenus. Il y a eu une bagarre, et nous avons eu le plus grand mal à le maîtriser. Il a demandé une audience avec vous, maîtresse Sauerback. » {n}Sur un signe de tête de la capitaine d'armes, les prévôts relâchent leur prisonnier.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Uno de los guardias habla con voz nasal y monótona.{/n} «Lo capturamos cuando intentaba abrirse paso hasta los detenidos. Se produjo una refriega. A duras penas conseguimos reducir al agitador. Exigió una audiencia con usted, maestra Sauerback». {n}La maestra de armas asiente con la cabeza y los guardias sueltan al prisionero.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}One of the enforcers drones nasally,{/n} "We apprehended him while he was trying to break through to the detained rabble. Got into a scuffle. We barely managed to restrain the troublemaker. He demanded an audience with you, Mistress Sauerback." {n}The Master-at-Arms nods, and the enforcers release their prisoner.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Uno de los guardias habla con voz nasal y monótona.{/n} «Lo capturamos cuando intentaba abrirse paso hasta los detenidos. Se produjo una refriega. A duras penas conseguimos reducir al agitador. Exigió una audiencia con usted, maestra Sauerback». {n}La maestra de armas asiente con la cabeza y los guardias sueltan al prisionero.{/n}

languages.text: {n}エンフォーサーの一人が鼻息荒くしゃべり続ける。{/n}「我々は、彼が拘束された群衆から抜け出そうとしているところを捕獲したのです。乱闘になりました。このトラブルメーカーをなんとか拘束できたのです。ザウアーバック様、彼はあなたとの面会を求めています」{n}マスター・アット・アームがうなずき、エンフォーサーが囚人を解放する。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}One of the enforcers drones nasally,{/n} "We apprehended him while he was trying to break through to the detained rabble. Got into a scuffle. We barely managed to restrain the troublemaker. He demanded an audience with you, Mistress Sauerback." {n}The Master-at-Arms nods, and the enforcers release their prisoner.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}エンフォーサーの一人が鼻息荒くしゃべり続ける。{/n}「我々は、彼が拘束された群衆から抜け出そうとしているところを捕獲したのです。乱闘になりました。このトラブルメーカーをなんとか拘束できたのです。ザウアーバック様、彼はあなたとの面会を求めています」{n}マスター・アット・アームがうなずき、エンフォーサーが囚人を解放する。{/n}

languages.text: {n}其中一位执法者用鼻音低声说道：{/n}“他打算突破我们的人墙，救出被拘留的叛乱分子，和我们打成了一团。我们终于勉强制服了这个闹事者之后，他要求见您一面，苏尔贝克女士。”{n}戒律大师点了点头，两位执法者松开了他们手中的囚犯。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}One of the enforcers drones nasally,{/n} "We apprehended him while he was trying to break through to the detained rabble. Got into a scuffle. We barely managed to restrain the troublemaker. He demanded an audience with you, Mistress Sauerback." {n}The Master-at-Arms nods, and the enforcers release their prisoner.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}其中一位执法者用鼻音低声说道：{/n}“他打算突破我们的人墙，救出被拘留的叛乱分子，和我们打成了一团。我们终于勉强制服了这个闹事者之后，他要求见您一面，苏尔贝克女士。”{n}戒律大师点了点头，两位执法者松开了他们手中的囚犯。{/n}

languages.text: {n}İnfazcılardan biri, genizden homurdanmaya başlıyor.{/n} "Onu tutuklu ayaktakımına ulaşmaya çalışırken yakaladık. Kavgaya karıştı. Baş belasını zorlukla zapt edebildik. Sizinle görüşmeyi talep etti Sauerback Hanım." {n}Silahtar'ın başıyla onaylamasının ardından infazcılar, mahkûmu serbest bırakıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}One of the enforcers drones nasally,{/n} "We apprehended him while he was trying to break through to the detained rabble. Got into a scuffle. We barely managed to restrain the troublemaker. He demanded an audience with you, Mistress Sauerback." {n}The Master-at-Arms nods, and the enforcers release their prisoner.{/n}
